DOC.detailed_description: This study within subjects/crossover design subject receive treatment serve his/her control . 100 subject recruit student/staff population university , 18 y/o old condition affect pupillary activity . Pupillary activity measure PLR100 pupillometer include pupillary diameter , pupillary response latency , maximum constriction velocity maximum redilation velocity . Subjects adapt dim light environment , measure take , treatment give either third fourth time period measure retake . The study approve NSU IRB . Subject number sufficient statistical power find effect . The study find effect treatment maximum size , show decrease treatment .
